DataElement.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Ability to Use Hands and Fingers Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Response about a subject's ability, during the past week, to use his/her hands and fingers.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Ability to Use Hands and Fingers
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores._At some point in a given period of time._The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about an individual's ability to use their hands and fingers.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores.

Concepts.definition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores.

Property.preferredName: During Past Week Ability to Use Hands and Fingers
Property.preferredDefinition: At some point in a given period of time.:The most recent week. May include the present day.:A question about an individual's ability to use their hands and fingers.

Concepts.definition: At some point in a given period of time.
The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: Ability to Use Hands and Fingers
Concepts.definition: A question about an individual's ability to use their hands and fingers.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Status of an individual's ability to use their hands and fingers.

PermissibleValues.value: Limitations in the use of hands or fingers, required the help of another person for all tasks (not independent even with use of special tools)
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Limitations in Use of Hands or Fingers; Requires Help for All Tasks

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Limitations in Use of Hands or Fingers; Requires Help for All Tasks
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has limitations in the use of their hands or fingers that requires the help of another person for all tasks, even with use of special tools.

Concepts.longName: Limitations in Use of Hands or Fingers; Requires Help for All Tasks
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has limitations in the use of their hands or fingers that requires the help of another person for all tasks, even with use of special tools.

PermissibleValues.value: Limitations in the use of hands or fingers, required the help of another person for most tasks (not independent even with use of special tools)
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Limitations in Use of Hands or Fingers; Requires Help for Most Tasks

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Limitations in Use of Hands or Fingers; Requires Help for Most Tasks
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has limitations in the use of their hands or fingers that requires the help of another person for most tasks, even with use of special tools.

Concepts.longName: Limitations in Use of Hands or Fingers; Requires Help for Most Tasks
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has limitations in the use of their hands or fingers that requires the help of another person for most tasks, even with use of special tools.

PermissibleValues.value: Limitations in the use of hands or fingers, required the help of another person for some tasks (not independent even with use of special tools)
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Limitations in Use of Hands or Fingers; Requires Help for Some Tasks

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Limitations in Use of Hands or Fingers; Requires Help for Some Tasks
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has limitations in the use of their hands or fingers that requires the help of another person for some tasks, even with use of special tools.

Concepts.longName: Limitations in Use of Hands or Fingers; Requires Help for Some Tasks
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has limitations in the use of their hands or fingers that requires the help of another person for some tasks, even with use of special tools.

PermissibleValues.value: Limitations in the use of hands or fingers, independent with use of special tools (did not require the help of another person)
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Limitations in Use of Hands or Fingers; Requires Special Tools for Independence

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Limitations in Use of Hands or Fingers; Requires Special Tools for Independence
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has limitations in the use of their hands or fingers, but remains independent through the use of special tools.

Concepts.longName: Limitations in Use of Hands or Fingers; Requires Special Tools for Independence
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has limitations in the use of their hands or fingers, but remains independent through the use of special tools.

PermissibleValues.value: Limitations in the use of hands or fingers, but did not require special tools or the help of another person
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Limitations in Use of Hands or Fingers

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Limitations in Use of Hands or Fingers
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has limitations in the use of their hands or fingers, but does not require special tools or the help of another person.

Concepts.longName: Limitations in Use of Hands or Fingers
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has limitations in the use of their hands or fingers, but does not require special tools or the help of another person.

PermissibleValues.value: Full use of two hands and ten fingers
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Full Use of Hands and Fingers

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Full Use of Hands and Fingers
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has full use of both hands and all 10 fingers.

Concepts.longName: Full Use of Hands and Fingers
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has full use of both hands and all 10 fingers.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.

ValueDomain.origin: HUI:Health Utilities Index; Feeny et al., Health Utilities Index Chapter 26 In Bert Spilker, ed. Quality of Life and Pharmacoeconomics in Clinical Trials. Second Edition. Philadelphia: Lippincott-Raven Press, 1996, pp 239-252.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Which one of the following best describes your ability, during the past week, to use your hands and fingers?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Which one of the following be
ReferenceDocuments.description: Which one of the following best describes the subject's ability, during the past week, to use his/her hands and fingers?    Note: Special tools refers to hooks for buttoning clothes, gripping devices for opening jars or lifting small items, and other devices to compensate for limitations of hands or fingers.

DataElement.origin: HUI:Health Utilities Index; Feeny et al., Health Utilities Index Chapter 26 In Bert Spilker, ed. Quality of Life and Pharmacoeconomics in Clinical Trials. Second Edition. Philadelphia: Lippincott-Raven Press, 1996, pp 239-252.
